author: rwesten
msg: Implementation of STANBOL-411:
* add LDPath support for
* entityhub/ldpath
* entityhub/sites/ldpath
* entityhub/site/{site-id}/ldpath
* RESTful service documentation
* Test that allows to execute the RESTful service included in the Docu
* Integration tests
Improvements for org.apache.stanbol.entityhub.ldpath (STANBOL-408)
* Added LDPath Transformer that allows to use existing ValueConverter implementation for the Entityhub
* Added EntityhubLDPath extends LDPath
* initialises LDPath with a configuration as typically used within the Entityhub.
* allows to use Representation as results of LDPath program executions.
Both this feature will be important when replaceing the current mapping language with LDPath

* Added a public Constructor to the RdfValueFactory that takes an MGraph. This allows to store the results for LDPath executions directly within an Clerezza Graph without the need to store results in an intermediate data structure.
* Added unit tests for this new features
others:
* The SolrYard now waits up to 5sec for the used SolrIndex to become available.
